A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An unoriginal movie that tries to destroy the history of the franchise by killing of beloved characters and at the same time ripping the original Trilogy (Remember that rebel soldier dragging his foot and stating \"It's salt\" just so we knew that and with that they were not completely ripping off the battle of HOTT!!) It was too long\, boring\, unoriginal and just bad! This movie is the last SW movie I will see!!
